verses.verse: But <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> false <S%G5578>prophets<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> there shall <S%G2071>be<s%> false <S%G5572>teachers<s%>, <S%G3748>who<s%> shall privily bring <S%G3919>in<s%> <S%G684>destructive<s%> <S%G139>heresies<s%>, <S%G720>denying<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G1203>Master<s%> that <S%G59>bought<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, bringing <S%G1863>upon<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G5031>swift<s%> <S%G684>destruction<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> shall <S%G1811>follow<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> lascivious <S%G684>doings<s%>; by reason <S%G1223>of<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%> shall be evil spoken <S%G987>of<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4124>covetousness<s%> shall <S%G1710>they<s%> with <S%G4112>feigned<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> make <S%G1710>merchandise<s%> of <S%G5209>you<s%>: <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2917>sentence<s%> <S%G691>now<s%> from of <S%G1597>old<s%> <S%G691>lingereth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G684>destruction<s%> <S%G3573>slumbereth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5339>spared<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> when they <S%G264>sinned<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5020>cast<s%> them down to <S%G5020>hell<s%>, and <S%G3860>committed<s%> them to <S%G4577>pits<s%> of <S%G2217>darkness<s%>, to be <S%G5083>reserved<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5339>spared<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2889>the<s%> <S%G744>ancient<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5442>preserved<s%> <S%G3575>Noah<s%> with seven <S%G3590>others<s%>, a <S%G2783>preacher<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>, when he <S%G1863>brought<s%> a <S%G2627>flood<s%> upon the <S%G2889>world<s%> of the <S%G765>ungodly<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5077>turning<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> of <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1116>Gomorrah<s%> into <S%G5077>ashes<s%> <S%G2632>condemned<s%> them with an <S%G2692>overthrow<s%>, having <S%G5087>made<s%> them an <S%G5262>example<s%> unto those that <S%G3195>should<s%> live <S%G764>ungodly<s%>;
and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4506>delivered<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G3091>Lot<s%>, sore <S%G2669>distressed<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G766>lascivious<s%> <S%G391>life<s%> of the <S%G113>wicked<s%>

(for <S%G1063><s%> that righteous <S%G1342>man<s%> <S%G1460>dwelling<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, in <S%G990>seeing<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G189>hearing<s%>, <S%G928>vexed<s%> his <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G1537>to<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2041>with<s%> their <S%G459>lawless<s%> <S%G2041>deeds<s%>):

the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> knoweth <S%G1492>how<s%> to <S%G4506>deliver<s%> the <S%G2152>godly<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3986>temptation<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> to <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G94>unrighteous<s%> under <S%G2849>punishment<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment<s%>;

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3122>chiefly<s%> them that <S%G4198>walk<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1939>lust<s%> of <S%G3394>defilement<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2706>despise<s%> <S%G2963>dominion<s%>. <S%G5113>Daring<s%>, <S%G829>self-willed<s%>, they <S%G5141>tremble<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G987>rail<s%> at <S%G1391>dignities<s%>:

whereas <S%G3699><s%> <S%G32>angels<s%>, <S%G5607>though<s%> <S%G3173>greater<s%> in <S%G1411>might<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2479>power<s%>, <S%G5342>bring<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G989>railing<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3844>before<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3778>these<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> creatures without <S%G249>reason<s%>, <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G5446>mere<s%> <S%G2226>animals<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> be <S%G259>taken<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5356>destroyed<s%>, <S%G987>railing<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> matters <S%G3739>whereof<s%> they are <S%G50>ignorant<s%>, shall <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5356>destroying<s%> surely be <S%G2704>destroyed<s%>,

suffering <S%G2865><s%> wrong as the <S%G3408>hire<s%> of <S%G93>wrong-doing<s%>; men that <S%G2233>count<s%> it <S%G2237>pleasure<s%> to <S%G5172>revel<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>day-time<s%>, <S%G4696>spots<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3470>blemishes<s%>, <S%G1792>revelling<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G539>deceivings<s%> while they <S%G4910>feast<s%> with <S%G5213>you<s%>;

having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G3428>adultery<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that cannot <S%G180>cease<s%> from <S%G266>sin<s%>; <S%G1185>enticing<s%> <S%G793>unstedfast<s%> <S%G2192>souls<s%>; having a <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G1128>exercised<s%> in <S%G4124>covetousness<s%>; <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G2671>cursing<s%>;

forsaking <S%G2641><s%> the <S%G2117>right<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%>, they went <S%G4105>astray<s%>, having <S%G1811>followed<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G903>Balaam<s%> the son of <S%G1007>Beor<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> the <S%G3408>hire<s%> of <S%G93>wrong-doing<s%>;

but <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G2192>was<s%> <S%G1649>rebuked<s%> <S%G3892>for<s%> <S%G2398>his<s%> own <S%G3892>transgression<s%>: a <S%G880>dumb<s%> <S%G5268>ass<s%> <S%G5350>spake<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>'s <S%G5456>voice<s%> and <S%G2967>stayed<s%> the <S%G3913>madness<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>.

These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G4077>springs<s%> without <S%G504>water<s%>, and <S%G3507>mists<s%> <S%G1643>driven<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> a <S%G2978>storm<s%>; for <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2217>blackness<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness<s%> hath been <S%G5083>reserved<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%>, <S%G5350>uttering<s%> great <S%G5246>swelling<s%> words of <S%G3153>vanity<s%>, they <S%G1185>entice<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, by <S%G766>lasciviousness<s%>, those who are <S%G3689>just<s%> <S%G668>escaping<s%> from them that <S%G390>live<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4106>error<s%>;

promising <S%G1861><s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1657>liberty<s%>, while they <S%G846>themselves<s%> <S%G5225>are<s%> <S%G1401>bondservants<s%> of <S%G5356>corruption<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> is <S%G2274>overcome<s%>, of the <S%G5129>same<s%> is he also brought into <S%G1402>bondage<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%>, after they have <S%G668>escaped<s%> the <S%G3393>defilements<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4990>Saviour<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1161>Christ<s%>, they <S%G1707>are<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1707>entangled<s%> <S%G5125>therein<s%> and <S%G2274>overcome<s%>, the last <S%G2078>state<s%> <S%G1096>is<s%> become <S%G5501>worse<s%> with <S%G846>them<s%> than the <S%G4413>first<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it were <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to have <S%G1921>known<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>, <S%G2228>than<s%>, after <S%G1921>knowing<s%> <S%G1994>it<s%>, to turn back <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G1785>the<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1161><s%> It has <S%G4819>happened<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> according to <S%G3942>the<s%> <S%G227>true<s%> <S%G3942>proverb<s%>, The <S%G2965>dog<s%> <S%G1994>turning<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1829>vomit<s%> <S%G1994>again<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5300>sow<s%> that had <S%G3068>washed<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2946>wallowing<s%> in the <S%G1004>mire<s%>.
